title: Replace Kuldeep founder photo static asset and ensure circular avatar quality

requirements.summary: Replace the Founder (Kuldeep) photo with the newly uploaded real photo as a static frontend asset and ensure the previous image is not used anywhere, preserving circular avatar crop quality.
acceptanceCriteria: The Founder (Kuldeep) image displayed in the Home page “Our Team”/Founders section is the newly uploaded real photo.
No other part of the site references or displays the previous/old Kuldeep founder image.
The Kuldeep founder image continues to be served as a static asset (not via the backend) and is rendered correctly in the circular avatar (no distortion; centered crop).
The image path used by the app remains valid (e.g., FoundersSection continues to load without broken images).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing static asset with the user-uploaded real Kuldeep founder photo, keeping the same filename/path so all current references remain valid and the old image is no longer served.

Ensure Kuldeep continues to reference the static asset at /assets/generated/founder-kuldeep.dim_512x512.jpg and adjust the avatar image classes to enforce a centered, non-distorted circular crop (e.g., object-cover + centered positioning) without changing founders order/names/roles; do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui.
